title: (x) Sans from Typeradio.org - Taxi (not yet released) {Nicolai (self)}
content:
Finally the [mystery font](http://web.archive.org/web/20081201180104/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/35651.html?1084396035) has been identified.   
   
Quote from e-mail:   
"The font used on the website typeradio.org   
is an extended and modified version of Stool.   
It will be released very soon under the name Taxi.   
Best regards Akiem Helmling/Underware

 [‹ (x) Looking for Accident font - Accident Grotesque (Ouch) {Dav}](http://web.archive.org/web/20081201180104/http:/www.typophile.com/node/15257 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) Heaven's Best cursive script - Lydian Cursive {Yves} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081201180104/http:/www.typophile.com/node/15260 "Go to next forum topic")
author: nicolai

comments.content: isn’t this Auto? I thought that they had to rename the font due to legal considerations.
The original post is over a year old.
This is so bizarre indeed — with the new system age old threads can be revived. I wish I could edit the names tho, that double HTML translation sure produced some ugly thread names. :^/

_The original post is over a year old._

thanks for the tip, zara. altho i fully realized this... i was just searching for [underware](http://web.archive.org/web/20081201180104/http:/www.typophile.com/wiki/underware) and this came up and i just wanted to clarify. taxi=auto, no?
